sentences.english: MAC, we won't be developing on PCs or any other devices.
sentences.chinese: 陆委会，我们不会开发PC或任何其他设备。

sentences.english: When the Soviets arrive, Mac reveals that he lied about being a double agent.
sentences.chinese: 当苏联抵达，陆委会透露，他说谎是一个双重间谍。

sentences.english: A representative for the Mainland Affairs Council said that the CSECC will meet twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 陆委会代表表示两岸经合会每年将召开两次会议。
